name: pern
description: Postgres Express React/Redux/React-Router-DOM Node stack boilerplate
author: Victor Li

scripts.prod: babel server -d dist --presets env --copy-files && cd client && yarn build && cd .. && node -r dotenv/config -r babel-register dist/index.js
scripts.server: nodemon --ignore client/ --exec node -r dotenv/config -r babel-register server/index.js
scripts.heroku-postbuild: babel server -d dist --presets env --copy-files && cd client && yarn --production=false && yarn run build
